snippet.title: Call of the Golden Valley Pre-release Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam! https://bit.ly/3UhJE6b

Call of the Golden Valley is a first-person,female-protagonist mystery game set in regional Victoria.
Delve into the depths of human psychology and desire to solve the mystery of the vanishing hikers.
Untangle fact from fiction as you explore the beautiful environment, learn the region's history and chat with the local characters.

Playing as an American tourist ready to return home from Australia, when a misadventure with a Magpie renders their passport ruined, the player starts with some unscheduled time in Australia. The twin of a childhood friend asks them to track down her twin sister, Marisa, who was last known to be  working in the Victorian country town of Phillipston. Upon arriving, they discover that she is not the only one who has disappeared; in the past two months, three others have vanished into the forest, lured by an old legend. Following the clues through observations and puzzles, the player must unravel the mystery surrounding this poem in the pursuit of finding Marisa… if it’s not too late.
